name: ExecutableInfoReader
description: Reads file, program, and optionally assembly version info from executables (and dlls)
author: Ryan Morrisroe
helpMarkDown: Creates variables based on the version info found in an executable or dll. See https://github.com/RyanMorrisroe/ExecutableInfoReader for more information.

inputs.name: fileName
inputs.label: File to read version attributes from
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file you want to read version attributes from.

inputs.name: variableRoot
inputs.label: Variable Root Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Value to prefix autogenerated variables with. Use if you plan on having multiple tasks of this type within the same pipeline.

inputs.name: loadProductVersion
inputs.label: Load Product Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, will create version variables based on the Product Version.

inputs.name: loadAssemblyVersion
inputs.label: Load Assembly Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, will create version variables based on the Assembly Version. Note that many executables will not have assembly version information available, in which case blank values will be output.
